Bootstrap popover trigger on hover instead of click

Source: R/spsUIcollections.R
bsHoverPopover.Rd

enhanced Bootstrap 3 popover by hovering, see bsplus::bs_embed_popover for details. Everything is the same but has additional trigger method, default "hover"

bsHoverPopover(
  tag,
  title = NULL,
  content = NULL,
  placement = "top",
  trigger = "hover",
  ...
)

Arguments

tag

htmltools::tag, generally htmltools::tags$button() or htmltools::tags$a(), into which to embed the popover
title

character, title for the popover, generally text
content

character, content for the popover body, can be HTML
placement

character, placement of the popover with respect to tag
trigger

trigger method, default "hover", one of click | hover | focus | manual.
...

other named arguments, passed to bsplus::bs_set_data()

Value

shiny element

Examples

if(interactive()){
    library(shiny)
    ui <- fluidPage(
        useSps(),
        actionButton('a', 'a') %>%
            bsHoverPopover(title = "title a", content = "a", placement = "bottom"),
        tags$a("b") %>%
            bsHoverPopover(title = "title b", content = "b", placement = "bottom")
    )
    server <- function(input, output, session) {}
    shinyApp(ui, server)
}
